text: Michael Richard Tomlak (born October 17, 1964 in Thunder Bay, Ontario) is a former professional ice hockey centre who played four seasons for the Hartford Whalers of the National Hockey League. Tomlak was drafted 208th overall by the Toronto Maple Leafs in the 1983 NHL Entry Draft.
